'''''Minecraft: Soothing Scenes''''' is a series of ten singles released for ''Minecraft'', featuring compositions by [[Samuel Åberg]], which feature ambience pertaining to the particular theme. The first five were released on December 16, 2022, followed by "Relaxing Cherry Grove" on June 2, 2023. Three more were released on December 22, 2023, along with a narrative single, "Soothing Story", connecting them together.
